casebody.data:
No. 999,

Misc.

Linkletter v. Walker, Warden. Truman Hobbs for petitioner. Jack P. F. Gremillion, Attorney General of Louisiana, and Teddy W. Airhart, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit granted. Case transferred to the appellate docket.
